Hasn't officially happened yet, but the first couple of drafts of next year's schedule has her teaching one class of 11th grade English. She's a former English teacher and has made it her mission to revitalize the department, especially in the face of all the CCSS stuff we'll be working on next year. So from her point of view, what better way to try and help move the department forward than to actually become part of if. We will see how it goes.

YES! Just tried watching the last Rangers game and it kept freezing if I tried to skip ahead. I think it was maybe doing that because I would skip into a commercial break and it wants to hold you there, but since you fast forwarded into it, it somehow locks up. I also hate you can't skip those damn commercials.
The MLB TV app on Apple TV 4 is crap. Worse than the old app. Only positive thing I can say about it is the picture is better (at least through the first 10 games or so).
Focus on socking away money into a retirement plan. Even if it is a little bit, get into the habit of doing it. Starting early pays off huge over many years. Harder to catch up the longer you wait.

WRITING.TEXT: Depends on which apps you want to use it for. For instance the Youtube app is screwed up and there are others that people complain about. Also some don't like the new remote, though it does use Siri which can be cool. I'm kind of in the middle. I like some of the new apps and games, but I dislike the remote and how some of the apps don't work very well.

I found a couple of forums where people have been complaining for the past few weeks, but no one has a solution that works longer than a few hours (the whole unplug it and plug it back in is the most popular way to do it).
But that's just a temp fix. We shouldn't have to do something like that at all.
I've known two. One pronounced it KAY-lee and the either pronounced it KAI-lee. Had a hell of a time trying to remember how to say each one whenever it came up.

WRITING.TITLE: Youtube on Apple TV4: Why is it still choppy even though the problem has been known for weeks?
WRITING.TEXT: The Youtube and Apple TV people all know about this I'm sure, and its been an issue for a few weeks now. Why is it taking so long to fix it? Is it just a very low priority for both? Is it a standoff on who has to fix their side of a technical issue? Anyone know?
Great if you're in Eastern Europe. Weird if you're in the middle of America and the parents probably couldn't find Slovenia on a globe if you gave them twenty guesses.
Any "normal" name that has had its spelling altered. Sarah becomes Sayrai or Thomas becomes Tomaz. Stop trying to make your kid unique with a weirdly spelled name.

Reading. I can't imagine what it would be like to be illiterate.

How much a disaster the American presidential campaigns have been. Sure we laugh at a lot of what is going on, but it shouldn't be a joke that these people are the best the different political parties can come up with. One of these people will be running the country this time next year, and I have little confidence in any of them.
I think they changed the Dinty Moore beef stew recipe. Last time I tried it, I thought I'd opened up a can of dog food by mistake.
Of the expressed written kind, I'm sure.

He's definitely in the wrong spot in the line-up. He's killed too many scoring opportunities so far this season. That and he's obviously trying way too hard, swinging at pitches far outside the strike zone. He needs time to regroup and also to relieve a little pressure. Put him either farther down the order, give him some time off, or MAYBE send him to the minors like we did with Odor last year and hope he comes back fired-up with his confidence back.
And our catcher for awhile, too. Thanks for putting us in sole first place.

WRITING.TITLE: Which $4.99 and above iPhone game is actually worth the money?

WRITING.TEXT:
Had a heart-to-heart talk with this high school sophomore who was making one bad choice after another. Really tried to help straighten this kid out because I thought he really wasn't as bad as others made him out to be. This is after he threatened to fight me after school over some really small thing. Anyway, after our talk, he thanks me, saying no one had really ever tried to just talk to him. He was always just kicked out of class, sent to the office, suspended, etc.
So I felt good after all this. Thought I was making a difference. Less than a week later he sets off hundreds of fireworks in the cafeteria during lunch. Caught on surveillance tape and everything doing it. End of his high school career. That was many years ago and I'm still extremely disappointed in the whole thing.

WRITING.TITLE: MLB TV app is a downgrade from previous years
WRITING.TEXT:
Unless I'm missing something, the following features are missing that were included in previous seasons: - highlights of the entire game - standings - pitchers for upcoming games
Last year's app wasn't perfect, but it was much better than this new one.
